name: Sumit K. Mandal
content: Sumit K Mandal Sumit K Mandal(Google Scholar | LinkedIn) Assistant Professor Department of Computer Science and Automation Indian Institute of Science Bengaluru 560012, India Home Research Teaching Research Group Outreach Events News photo gallery Brief Biography I am an assistant professor in the department of Computer Science and Automation at IISc., Bangalore. I am currently leading the 'Future Computing Systems' (FIST) group. I completed my PhD in 2022 under the advice of Dr. Umit Y. Ogras at eLab in Electrical and Computer Engineering at University of Wisconsin-Madison (UW-Madison). Before joining UW-Madison, I was in Arizona State University (ASU). I completed my dual degree (B.Tech & M.Tech which is equivalent to BS & MS) from Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur (IIT Kharagpur) in the year of 2015. I was a Research & Development Engineer at Synopsys India Pvt. Ltd. from 2015 to 2017. My research interest includes networks-on-chip design & analysis, accelerators for machine learning algorithms, power management for heterogeneous systems-on-chip.
